channel.title: Comments on: More Resilience Training Can Produce Richer, More Powerful Results.
channel.description: Strategies to recover from stress quickly

item.title: By: Kate Levens
item.dc:creator: Kate Levens
item.description: I checked your site for the obvious reason....to de-stress. Oh, I was so happy to see an August post and you hit it on the head that a person gets involved and doesn't keep up with their practice of self care. Thank you for continuing your site and I will keep up with self care. Kate
item.content:encoded:
I checked your site for the obvious reason….to de-stress. Oh, I was so happy to see an August post and you hit it on the head that a person gets involved and doesn’t keep up with their practice of self care. Thank you for continuing your site and I will keep up with self care.
Kate
